title: Mesa Grill Margarita
ingredients: - 1 ounce orange liqueur, such as Cointreau or Triple Sec
directions: Pour the tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice into a cocktail shaker, add ice, and shake for 10 seconds. Rub the rim of a rocks glass with the lime slice and dip in a plate of salt. Strain the mixture into the glass and garnish with the lime slice.
